item.title: Generative art: Ad Astra
item.description: Візуалізація монологу з фільму Ad Astra за допомоги nodebox. Фільм Ad Astra завершується коротким монологом головного героя: I’m steady, calm. I slept well, no bad dreams. I am active and engaged. I’m aware of my surroundings and those in my immediate sphere. I’m attentive. I am focused on the essentials, to the exclusion of all else. I’m unsure of the future, but I’m not concerned. I will rely on those closest to me, and I will share their burdens, as they share mine.
